name: Royal Decree (furqaan)
description:
Created by: Furqaan & Yi Yong

COMPLETE ALL 4 LEVELS!

Game Summary

Peter is a family man living in a poor, hungry town. Working under the royal family, he has to keep the princess’s tummy full or risk the lives of his family! In order to accomplish this, Peter has to face many angry villagers. Do you think Peter can satisfy the princess cravings and keep his loved ones alive?

Game Outline

As Peter, the player can travel across town to hunt for food. Peter has to satisfy the princess’s cravings by getting what she asks for. Food appears at random locations, and changes over time. As the player progresses, the princess’s appetite grows bigger and the villagers grow angrier. As the hungry villagers notice him gathering food, they try to find ways to stop him.

Credits
Coming soon!
